faculty.name: Deepak Yadav
faculty.sortBio: Structural and earthquake engineering expert specializing in metallic yielding dampers and seismic response control.
description: Dr. Deepak Yadav is presently working as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Civil Engineering at IIT Jammu. He did PhD in Structural Engineering from IIT Delhi and BTech in Civil Engineering from IIT Roorkee. His doctoral research was focused on metallic-yielding dampers and he filed a patent on the developed damper as co-inventor. His research interests are seismic response control, retrofitting of structures, steel and aluminum structures, and earthquake-resistant design. Dr. Yadav also has industrial experience in the structural design of buildings in Africa, Middle East, and India regions. He has been a part of more than twenty projects as a structural engineer and peer reviewer.
